ai_response:
The curriculum for BSIT 1st year 1st semester includes the following subjects:

* College Algebra (CSES-ALG) - 3 units
* Mathematics In The Modern World (GE-MMW) - 3 units
* Readings In Philippine History (GE-RPHIS) - 3 units
* Understanding The Self (GE-USELF) - 3 units
* Fundamentals Of Programming (IT11-FPROG) - 3 units
* Introduction To Computing (IT11-INTROCOM) - 3 units
* National Service Training Program 1 (NSTP1) - 3 units
* Physical Fitness 1 (PATHFIT1) - 2 units

[curriculum_ccs]

metadata.formatted_text:
============================================================
CURRICULUM: BSIT
DEPARTMENT: CCS
============================================================


YEAR 1
------------------------------------------------------------

1st Semester:
  CSES-ALG     | College Algebra                          | 3 units
  GE-MMW       | Mathematics In The Modern World          | 3 units
  GE-RPHIS     | Readings In Philippine History           | 3 units
  GE-USELF     | Understanding The Self                   | 3 units
  IT11-FPROG   | Fundamentals Of Programming              | 3 units
  IT11-INTROCOM | Introduction To Computing                | 3 units
  NSTP1        | National Service Training Program 1      | 3 units
  PATHFIT1     | Physical Fitness 1                       | 2 units

2nd Semester:
  CSES-CAL     | Calculus                                 | 3 units
  CSES-PHY     | Physics                                  | 3 units
  GE-PURCOM    | Purposive Communication                  | 3 units
  GEE-PANFIL   | Panitikan Ng Pilipinas                   | 3 units
  IT12-DIGD    | Digital Design                           | 3 units
  IT12-DSA     | Data Structures And Algorithms           | 3 units
  IT12-INTPROG | Intermediate Programming                 | 3 units
  NSTP2        | National Service Training Program 2      | 3 units
  PATHFIT2     | Physical Fitness 2                       | 2 units

YEAR 2
------------------------------------------------------------

1st Semester:
  GE-RIZ       | Life And Works Of Rizal                  | 3 units
  GE-STS       | Science, Technology, And Society         | 3 units
  IT21-DM      | Data Management                          | 3 units
  IT21-IM      | Information Management                   | 3 units
  IT21-PT1     | Platform Technologies 1                  | 3 units
  ITPECGA      | Ethics And Good Governance               | 3 units
  PATHFIT3     | Traditional And Contemporary Dance       | 2 units

2nd Semester:
  GE-CONWO     | The Contemporary World                   | 3 units
  GEE-COMS     | Communications Skills                    | 3 units
  GEE-PSTAT    | Probability And Statistics               | 3 units
  IT22-DB1     | Database 1                               | 3 units
  IT22-NET1    | Networking 1                             | 3 units
  IT22-OOP     | Object-oriented Programming              | 3 units
  IT22-PT2     | Platform Technologies 2                  | 3 units
  PATHFIT4     | Physical Fitness 4                       | 2 units

YEAR 3
------------------------------------------------------------

1st Semester:
  GEE-PMT      | Principles Of Management And Teamwork    | 3 units
  IT31-DB2     | Database 2                               | 3 units
  IT31-NET2    | Networking 2                             | 3 units
  IT31-SAD     | Systems Analysis And Design              | 3 units
  IT31-WEB     | Web Systems And Technologies             | 3 units
  IT31-EDOOP   | Enterprise And Distributed Object-oriented Programming | 3 units
  IT31-MS      | Multimedia Systems                       | 3 units

2nd Semester:
  IT32-ITPROJ1 | It Project 1                             | 3 units
  IT32-IS      | Information Systems                      | 3 units
  IT32-SE      | Software Engineering                     | 3 units
  IT32-HCI     | Human-computer Interaction               | 3 units
  IT32-MOBAPP  | Mobile Application Development           | 3 units
  IT32-RESMETH | Research Methods In It                   | 3 units

YEAR 4
------------------------------------------------------------

1st Semester:
  IT41-ITPROJ2 | It Project 2                             | 3 units
  IT41-SIM     | Systems Integration And Management       | 3 units
  IT41-ITPROF  | It Professional Practice                 | 3 units
  IT41-INFSEC  | Information Security                     | 3 units
  IT41-ITEL1   | It Elective 1                            | 3 units

2nd Semester:
  IT42-CAPSTONE | Capstone Project                         | 3 units
  IT42-ITEL2   | It Elective 2                            | 3 units
  IT42-ITEL3   | It Elective 3                            | 3 units
  IT42-OJT     | Practicum / On-the-job Training          | 6 units
